publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-10 John Park: Fife Teams in Scottish Cup Finals—That the Parliament congratulates Dunfermline Athletic FC and Kelty Hearts JFC on reaching their respective Scottish cup finals; recognises the achievement of Dunfermline in reaching three national finals since 2004 in difficult circumstances for the club; acknowledges Kelty’s achievement in reaching its first Scottish Junior Cup Final since 1999 while overcoming high quality opposition to reach the final, and hopes that the supporters of all the clubs participating in the finals enjoy two good games of football.
S3M-10 Fife Teams in Scottish Cup Finals (lodged on 14 May 2007) Jackie Baillie*, Richard Baker*, Charlie Gordon*, Claire Baker*
S3M-10 Fife Teams in Scottish Cup Finals (lodged on 14 May 2007) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-10 Fife Teams in Scottish Cup Finals (lodged on 14 May 2007) Karen Gillon*

S3M-10 John Park: Fife Teams in Scottish Cup Finals—That the Parliament congratulates Dunfermline Athletic FC and Kelty Hearts JFC on reaching their respective Scottish cup finals; recognises the achievement of Dunfermline in reaching three national finals since 2004 in difficult circumstances for the club; acknowledges Kelty’s achievement in reaching its first Scottish Junior Cup Final since 1999 while overcoming high quality opposition to reach the final, and hopes that the supporters of all the clubs participating in the finals enjoy two good games of football. Supported by: Jackie Baillie, Richard Baker, Charlie Gordon, Claire Baker, Dr Richard Simpson, Karen Gillon
S3M-10 Fife Teams in Scottish Cup Finals (lodged on 14 May 2007) George Foulkes* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S3M-10 Fife Teams in Scottish Cup Finals (lodged on 14 May 2007) Pauline McNeill*
